channel.title: Senior Developer Advocate
channel.description: Senior Developer Advocate from Lagos, Nigeria Media Developer Expert at Cloudinary and Technical Instructor at egghead.io

item.title: unStack Workshop on React.js to Kick Off Soon in Lagos
item.description: Free unStack Workshop on React.js Coming Up in Lagos on March 20-21 2020, learn about the tracks, agenda, and speakers at the free unStack Workshop to be held in Lagos on March 20-21 2020.
item.dc:creator: shodipoayomide.com

item.title: Safeguard your blog content in Reactjs and CSS
item.description: Curious about how to safeguard your blog content in your ReactJS app using CSS? You are about to find out!
item.dc:creator: shodipoayomide.com

item.title: unStack 2019 event recap; All the announcements that matter
item.description: unStack is a hands-on workshop community, tailored towards building great technical talents with a hands-on learning approach, learning about new technologies/tools and mastering patterns to navigate already existing ones.
item.dc:creator: shodipoayomide.com

item.title: Getting started with Raspberry Pi 3
item.description: Raspberry Pi 3 is a small computer the size of an ATM card which was built by the Raspberry Pi foundation and has the ability to connect with external devices and networks via wireless LAN and Bluetooth connectivity.
item.dc:creator: shodipoayomide.com

item.title: Deploying Apps to GitHub using TortoiseGIT
item.description: CodeSandbox and Netlify are like a passenger and an Uber driver, the passenger enters into the car and the uber driver starts the car and keeps on moving, CodeSandbox started with a super amazing idea by Ives van Hoorne the Creator of CodeSandbox and now works fulltime developing it.
item.dc:creator: Shodipo Ayomide

item.title: Career in Software Engineering
item.description: Software Engineers write software. They write the instructions that tell the computer what to do.
item.dc:creator: shodipoayomide.com

item.title: Understanding the concept behind AIML
item.description: AIML or Artificial Intelligence Markup Language is an XML base language used for creating chatbots(AI), it is always saved with the extension `.aiml`.
item.dc:creator: shodipoayomide.com
